ComicInfo.Title: Artbabe in Too Punk To Funk?; Eight Questions; The Bat; The Other Ending; Morning; Pizza Face
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-11 13:41:18. [CVDB142012] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 11:59:09. [Issue ID 304895]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A "to the best of my recollection" tale of from Roberta Gregory's first year of college in 1971 about a man she knew and went on a couple dates with. A few years later she saw him on the news for shooting people in a shopping center.
Three roommate deal with a live bat in their apartment in the middle of the night.
Humorous 10-panel strip featuring an alternative ending to "Morning."
